title: Gab and Juls: Man City Showing Weaknesses?
description:
Gab Marcotti is joined by Don Hutchison to take a look at Manchester City’s thrilling draw away at Newcastle, discuss Chelsea’s crushing defeat at the hands of Leeds United, analyze the latest transfer gossip surrounding Manchester United and question some curious interference from a member of Christian Pulisic’s family.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Man City's thrilling draw at Newcastle; Tuchel's excuses after Chelsea's stunning defeat at Leeds United; Man United's dartboard transfer window
